attributes.action: Make Joe Shingleton Ruler of The Uk
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: You know you want to... I'll do a little better than the rubbish weve got now. And i'll promise to fullfil any of the other petitions forwarded,even if there are some which contradict one another.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
